definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-52" y="224"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">MOB</field><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">stopsound @a[distance=..20] * minecraft:entity.generic.explode</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">playsound everlaartifacts:deltarune_explosion player @a ~ ~ ~</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
